title: Computation of compensation earned or earnable
context: §88-141 Computation of compensation earned or earnable. In any case where it shall become necessary, for the purposes of sections 88-131 to 88-142, to determine the compensation or average compensation of a member of the system during any period of the member&rsquo;s service in the armed forces, or during any period immediately thereafter while the member was not an employee as defined in section 88-21, the member&rsquo;s rate of compensation during the period shall, for the purposes of sections 88-131 to 88-142, be deemed to have been that which the member would have received but for the member&rsquo;s service in the armed forces. [L 1951, c 262, pt of §3; RL 1955, §6-120; HRS §88-131; am L 1969, c 110, pt of §1; gen ch 1985; am L 2008, c 41, §6]
